item.title: Cave Descent reinforcement learning game
item.description:
This May I partecipatd at HackUPC 2025, an hackhathon organized by FIB in Barcelona.

Together with Vojtěch, we built a reinforcement learning agent that learns to play a game similar to Geometry Dash’s rocket section. The agent is trained using deep Q-Learning and we built the game using pygame.

Devpost: https://devpost.com/software/rocket-deep-reinforcement-learning
Code: https://github.com/matteodegobbi/CaveDescentRL
Vojtěch’s webiste: https://vojtechbestak.cz/\
